amendment.description: Relative to authority to reconsider decisions of Secretary of Veterans Affairs or Secretary of the Army to inter the remains or honor the memory of a person in a national cemetery.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2146 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2146 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2146 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2146 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
